page.title: 04Davis and Metcalfe
page.content: This engineering firm makes railway braking systems. In a typical day we're all very busy the first thing we do is look at the mail to see what immediate action needs to be taken.If I became unemployed I wouldn't know what to do because I've always worked with trains. When I was young I wanted to join the Navy but I was too young so I became an accountant. Ilike the job it's very satisfying. Istarted at the bottom and worked my way to the top. There is nothing that happens every day at exactly the same time every day is different. We officially work a thirty nine hour week,but unofficially we often work sixty hours
